alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 1:39PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Yukon River at Circle. * WHEN...Until 400 PM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 136 PM AKDT, observers report an ice jam on the Yukon River about 6 miles downriver from Circle that is causing river levels to rise and flooding the access road to the airport at Circle. Flooding of low lying areas at Circle will continue until the ice jam releases. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - Please stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or your favorite local weather news source for updates on this situation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
